Main¶

The main DSE flow that integrates all modules

class autodse.main.Main¶

The main DSE flow.

start_time¶

Timestamp when launching the flow.

args¶

Flow arguments.

src_dir¶

Path of the user source project.

work_dir¶

Path of the working space.

out_dir¶

Path of the output folder.

eval_dir¶

Path of the evaluation working space.

log_dir¶

Path of logs.

db_path¶

Path of persisted database.

cfg_path¶

Path of the configuration file.

log¶

Logger.

config¶

A dictionary of configurations.

db¶

Database.

evaluator¶

Evaluator.

reporter¶

Reporter.

static accurate_runner(points: List[Dict[str, Union[str, int]]], db: autodse.database.Database, evaluator: autodse.evaluator.evaluator.Evaluator, config: Dict[str, Any])¶

Perform phase 2 DSE for a given set of points.

This is a static method that is supposed to be used for forking explorer threads.

Parameters

  • points -- A list of target design poitns.

  • db -- Database.

  • evaluator -- Evaluator.

  • config -- Configuration.

check_eval_log() → None¶

Parse eval.log and display its errors.

static fast_runner(tag: str, ds: Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter], db: autodse.database.Database, evaluator: autodse.evaluator.evaluator.Evaluator, config: Dict[str, Any]) → None¶

Perform fast DSE for a given design space.

This is a static method that is supposed to be used for forking explorer threads.

Parameters

  • tag -- A tag of this run.

  • ds -- Design space.

  • db -- Database.

  • evaluator -- Evaluator.

  • config -- Configuration.

gen_accurate_outputs() → None¶

Generate final outputs.

gen_fast_outputs() → List[Dict[str, Union[str, int]]]¶

Generate outputs after fast mode.

Note

The best cache in the DB will be cleaned up by this function.

Returns

A list of design points output by fast mode.

init_workspace() → Optional[str]¶

Initialize the workspace.

Returns

The backup directory if available.

launch_accurate(points: List[Dict[str, Union[str, int]]]) → None¶

Launch accurate exploration.

Parameters

points -- A list of target design poitns.

launch_fast(ds_list: List[Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter]]) → List[Dict[str, Union[str, int]]]¶

Launch fast exploration.

Parameters

ds_list -- A list of design space partitions.

Returns

A list of output design points.

load_config() → Dict[str, Any]¶

Load the DSE configurations.

Returns

A dictionary of configurations.

main() → None¶

The main function of the DSE flow.

autodse.main.arg_parser() → argparse.Namespace¶

Parse user arguments.
